metadata.Title: CVE-2011-3821 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.Description: xajax 0.6 beta1 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information viaa direct request to a .php file, which reveals the installation path in anerror message, as demonstrated byxajax_core/plugin_layer/xajaxScriptPlugin.inc.php and certain other files.

criterions.comment: php-xajax package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
